original_title: Little Mix: The Last Show (For Now...)
overview: Little Mix presents "The Last Show (for nowâ€¦)," a global livestream of the final show of their huge Confetti tour live from the O2 Arena, London on Saturday 14 May 2022.  This was the last chance for fans to see Little Mix perform live before they take their break from the band to focus on other projects.
title: Little Mix: The Last Show (For Now...)
